Source.Name: xVideoServiceThief
Source.Summary: Download Videos from a lot of important Web Video Services
Source.Description: xVideoServiceThief is a tool for downloading your favourite video clips from a lot of video websites. xVideoServiceThief also provide you the ability to convert each video in most popular formats: AVI, MPEG1, MPEG2, WMV, MP4, 3GP, MP3 file formats.
xVideoServiceThief popüler video sitelerden video indirme aracı

Source.Name: lemonpos
Source.Summary: An open source Point of Sale software targeted for micro, small and medium businesses
Source.Description: Lemon Is an opensource Point of Sale software for micro, small and medium businesses. Supports many POS terminals with a single database on a network and has been tested with Star Micronics Thermal/Parallel printers and Datalogic barcode readers.

lemonpos mikro, küçük ve orta ölçekli işletmeler için satış yazılımıdır. Bir ağ üzerinde tek bir veritabanını destekler. POS terminalleri ve Star Micronics Termal / Paralel yazıcılar ve Datalogic barkod okuyucularını kullanabilirsiniz.

Source.Name: openerp-server
Source.Summary: The server for OpenERP - The world's most advanced Open Source ERP and CRM
Source.Description: OpenERP is a complete ERP and CRM. The main features are accounting (analytic and financial), stock management, sales and purchases management, tasks automation, marketing campaigns, help desk, POS, etc. Technical features include a distributed server, flexible workflows, an object database, a dynamic GUI, customizable reports, and SOAP and XML-RPC interfaces.
openerp-server, kurumsal kaynak planlaması sunucusudur.

Source.Name: openerp-client
Source.Summary: Gtk client for OpenERP - The world's most advanced Open Source ERP and CRM
Source.Description: OpenERP is a complete ERP and CRM. The main features are accounting (analytic and financial), stock management, sales and purchases management, tasks automation, marketing campaigns, help desk, POS, etc. Technical features include a distributed server, flexible workflows, an object database, a dynamic GUI, customizable reports, and SOAP and XML-RPC interfaces.
openerp-client, kurumsal kaynak planlama yazılımı GTK arayüzlü istemcisidir.

Source.Name: krecipes
Source.Description: Krecipes is a highly configurable recipe manager, designed to make organizing your personal recipes collection fast and easy. Features include: shopping lists, nutrient analysis, advanced search, recipe ratings, import/export various formats, and more.

krecipes, kişisel yemek tariflerini hızlı ve kolay organize hale getirmek için tasarlanmış bir programdır. Özellikleri şunlardır: alışveriş listeleri, besin analizi, gelişmiş arama, tarifi derecelendirme, ithalat / ihracat çeşitli biçimlerde ve daha fazlası.

Source.Name: minbar
Source.Summary: Athan call and prayer times notification software
Namaz saati ve Kıble yönü uygulaması
Source.Description: Minbar is a GNOME GUI with tray icon, for athan call and notifications for Islam prayer times.
Minbar Namaz vakitlerini, Kıble yönünü gösteren ve Namaz vakitlerinde ezan okuyan bir gnome uygulamasıdır.

Source.Name: luckyBackup
Source.Summary: A GUI for backup and synchronization based on rsync
Source.Description: luckyBackup is an application that backs-up and/or synchronizes any directories with the power of rsync.
luckyBackup, rsync gücüyle verinizi yedeklemeye ve yedeklenmiş klasörleri eşitlemeye yarar.

Source.Name: pybackpack
Source.Summary: User oriented backup and restore application
Kullanıcı odaklı yedekleme ve geri yükleme uygulaması
Source.Description: pybackpack is python/gtk backup application that uses rdiff-backup. So it can be run over ssh or other.
pybackpack, rdiff-backup kullanan python/gtk yedekleme uygulamasıdır. Bu yüzden ssh v.s üzerinde çalıştırılabilir.

Source.Name: backintime-common
Source.Description: backintime-common, contains non GUI files used by different GUI fontends. Back In Time is a simple backup tool for Linux inspired from “flyback project” and “TimeVault”. The backup is done by taking snapshots of a specified set of directories.
Backintime-common, arayüzler tarafından kullanılan ortak dosyaları içerir. Backintime, flyback projesi ve TimeVault tan esinlenilmiştir.

Source.Name: backintime
Source.Summary: Simple backup system for KDE4 Desktop
Source.Description: backintime-kde4 is a KDE4 GUI frontend for backintime-common.

Source.Name: flyback
Source.Description: flyback is snapshot rsync-based backup utility similar to the concept of Apple's Time Machine.
flyback, Apple'ın Time Machine benzeri rsync tabanlı yedekleme programıdır.

Source.Name: hippo-canvas
Source.Summary: A canvas library based on GTK+-2, Cairo, and Pango
Source.Description: Hippo Canvas is a Cairo/GObject/GTK+ based canvas.
Hippo Canvas, Cairo/GNOME/GTK+ tabanlı canvas kütüphanesi.

Source.Name: drgeo
Source.Description: Dr. Geo is a interactive geometry GUI application. It allows one to create geometric figure plus the interactive manipulation of such figure in respect with their geometric constraints. It is useable in teaching situation with students from primary or secondary level.
Dr Geo, interaktif geometri uygulamasıdır.

Source.Name: libitl
Source.Summary: Libraries for The Islamic Tools and Libraries Project
Source.Description: The Islamic Tools and Libraries (ITL) is a project to provide a plethora of useful Islamic tools and applications as well as a comprehensive feature-full Islam-centric library. The ITL project currently includes Hijri date, Muslim prayer times, and Qibla.
ITL, İslami araçlar için kütüphanedir. ITL projesi içerinde Hicri tarih, namaz saatleri ve kıble yönü bilgileri yer alır.

Source.Name: tinyxml
Source.Summary: A simple, small, C++ XML parser
Basit ve hafif bir XML ayrıştırıcı
Source.Description: TinyXML is a simple, small, C++ XML parser that can be easily integrating into other programs.
TinyXML, C++ için basit ve hafif bir XML ayrıştırıcıdır. Diğer programlara kolayca entegre edilebilir.

Update.Comment: First release. (Initial release by Anıl Özbek)
Update.Name: Ertan Argüden

Source.Name: psycopg2
Source.Description: Psycopg is a PostgreSQL database adapter for the Python programming language. This is version 2, a complete rewrite of the original code to provide new-style classes for connection and cursor objects and other sweet candies. Like the original, psycopg 2 was written with the aim of being very small and fast, and stable as a rock.

Update.Comment: Version bump. Add dep egenix-mx-base. Add setup.py.patch. Add translations.xml
Update.Name: Ertan Argüden

Source.Name: pychart
Source.Description: PyChart is a Python library for creating high quality Encapsulated Postscript, PDF, PNG, or SVG charts. It currently supports line plots, bar plots, range-fill plots, and pie charts.
PyChart yüksek kalitede Postscript, PDF, PNG veya SVG grafikler oluşturmaya yarayan python kütüphanesidir.

Source.Name: pydot
Source.Summary: Python interface to Graphviz's Dot language
Source.Description: pydot allows to easily create both directed and non directed graphs from Python. Currently all attributes implemented in the Dot language are supported.
Pydot pyhton ile grafikler oluşturmanızı sağlar. Dot dilindeki tüm özellikleri destekler.

Source.Name: radiotray
Source.Summary: Online radio player for system tray
Sistem tepsisi için çevrimiçi radyo çalıcısı
Source.Description: Radio Tray is an online radio streaming player that runs on system tray. Its goal is to have the minimum interface possible, making it very straightforward to use.
Radio Tray, sistem tepsisine yerleşen çok sade bir arayüze sahip çevrimiçi radyo çalıcısıdır.

Update.Comment: Version Bump. Add rundep notify-python. gstreamer,gst-plugins-base. License modify.
Update.Name: Ertan Argüden

Source.Name: videoporama
Source.Summary: A software to make image slideshow, export to video file
Source.Description: Videoporama is a software designed to make image slideshow, export to video file.
Videoporama ile fotoğraflarınızdan slideshow yapabilir, video olarak çıktı alabilirsiniz.

Source.Name: VideoCut
Source.Summary: Application for creating compositions of screenshots from video files
Source.Description: VideoCut is an open source desktop application specialized for creating compositions of screenshots from video files.
VideoCut, videolardan ekran görüntüsü almaya yarayan programdır

Source.Name: lintv
Source.Description: LinTV is basically a program for viewing and recording TV.
LinTV kayıt yapabilen tv programıdır.

Source.Name: freetuxtv
Source.Description: freetuxtv is webtv player, working on the Linux platform. It can be used by french people to watch ADSL TV on the PC with ISPs Free and SFR. The GUI is developed in GTK2+ and is using the VLC engine to display the channels.
Freetuxtv gtk2 ile yazılmış, vlc kullanan internettv uygulamasıdır. Kotanıza Dikkat Edin.

Source.Name: tivion
Source.Summary: A simple player to online TV streaming
Source.Description: Tivion internet üzerinden veri akışı sağlayan pygtk, mplayer tabanlı televizyon ve radyo uygulamasıdır. Kotalı internet kullanıyorsanız kotanıza dikkat edin.
Tivion is a simple player streaming TV channels and radio implemented in Python and PyGTK using the Mplayer backend.

Source.Name: transmageddon
Source.Description: Transmageddon is a video transcoder built using GStreamer.
Transmageddon GStreamer altyapılı video dönüştürme uygulamasıdır.

Source.Name: linuxvideoconverter
Source.Description: Linux video converter simplifies conversion of videos to different formats.
linuxvideoconverter, farklı formatlarda videoların dönüşümü kolaylaştırır.

Source.Name: bombono-dvd
Source.Description: Bombono DVD is a DVD authoring program. t is made easy to use and has nice and clean GUI (Gtk).
Bombono DVD ile DVD hazırlayıp, yazabilirsiniz.

Source.Name: camorama
Source.Description: camorama is gnome webcam application featuring various image filters
Camorama, çeşitli filtreleri olan webcam uygulamasıdır

Source.Name: jalbum
Source.Description: JAlbum makes Web albums of your digital images. No extra software is needed to view your galleries other than a Web browser. Unlike \"server side\" album scripts, a JAlbum gallery can be served from a plain Web server without scripting support. JAlbum\'s built in Web server allows you to share your albums straight from JAlbum. You can also share your albums on a CD.
JAlbum, fotoğraf albümleri yapabilir ve fotoğraflarınızı web ortamında paylaşabilirsiniz. Ayrıca, CD olarak da albümlerinizi paylaşabilirsiniz.

Source.Name: imagination
Source.Description: Imagination is a lightweight and simple DVD slide show maker written in C language and built with the GTK+2 toolkit.
Imagination ile fotoğraflarınızdan slayt gösterileri yapabilirsiniz.

Source.Name: sagcad
Source.Description: SagCAD is easy to use 2D Computer Aided Drafting and Modelling application.

Source.Name: qmotion
Source.Summary: A Qt4-based motion detection application for webcams
Source.Description: Qmotion is Qt4-based motion detection application for webcams
qmotion webcamlar için hareket algılayıcı qt4 programıdır

Source.Name: PythonCAD
Source.Description: PythonCAD is a CAD package written, surprisingly enough, in Python. The PythonCAD project aims to produce a scriptable, open-source, easy to use CAD package for Linux
PythonCAD , python ile yazılmış cad uygulamasıdır

Source.Name: photofilmstrip
Source.Summary: Creates movies out of pictures using a Ken Burns effect.
Source.Description: PhotoFilmStrip creates movies out of your pictures in just 3 steps. First select your photos, customize the motion path and render the video. There are several output possibilities for VCD, SVCD, DVD up to FULL-HD.
PhotoFilmStrip fotoğraflarınızdan sadece 3 adımda video oluşturur.
